attributes.action: Parking penalty charge should be in line with normal charge and within £10
attributes.additional_details: For parking in a parking bay, normal charge is £3-£7 for an hour. But when giving penalty it is £65 to £130 which is  unproportionate to its original charge. Penalty Should not be more than its original value. But currently penalty is more than 1000% of its original value and  there is no legal ground of doing such unfairness.So it should be reduced to £10 which is closer to its original value.
